Flatten a character vector of individual JSON lines into a

Flatten a character vector of individual JSON lines into a tbl_dt

flatten(x)

Arguments

x
character vector of individual JSON lines to flatten

Value

tbl_dt

Examples

flatten('{"top":{"next":{"final":1,"end":true},"another":"yes"},"more":"no"}')
#> Source: local data table [1 x 4]
#> 
#> # tbl_dt [1 Ã— 4]
#>    more top.another top.next.end top.next.final
#>   <chr>       <chr>        <lgl>          <dbl>
#> 1    no         yes         TRUE              1
#>
